title: S3 Ep49: Politics and ethnicity in Africa
itunes:title: Politics and ethnicity in Africa
description: Some ethnic groups are active in African politics, and some are not. Valeria Rueda tells Tim Phillips the fascinating story of how two socioeconomic revolutions more than a century ago shaped post-colonial political power.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
